 2021-05852021-06-17ESDC,  LAB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Occupational Health and Safety Regulations (Part XI)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS (PART XI) in order to (1) update the definition of a confined space based on physical characteristics of the space; (2) align with industry practices and standards regarding assessment and inspection of confined spaces.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0143 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
